snippet: Strong equity gains after the government reported an unexpected drop in the unemployment rate dwindled as the day went on.
abstract: Stocks break four-day string of gains, ending slightly lower as an unexpected drop in the nation’s unemployment rate was overshadowed by concerns about the coming earnings reporting period.
lead_paragraph: Strong equity gains after the government reported an unexpected drop in the unemployment rate dwindled as the day went on.

headline.seo: Jobs Rally Fades on Wall Street
